EmailTemplate.name: MMAdClientRejectionNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: AD {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is rejected by Client
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.OwnerFirstName},
The AD {ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is rejected by Client. You need to rework on the AD and resend the AD for approval.
Sincerely, ADvendio Team
